basics.name: Bogdanovic Stefan
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary:
Stefan is a seasoned full stack developer with over 7 years of experience in modern web development.
He has contributed to high-impact projects for major players like Proximus, Telenet, VLAIO, and Keytrade Bank.
Known for his calm under pressure and proactive attitude, Stefan takes ownership of code deployments in production environments and brings a strategic, high-level understanding of technical workflows.
He thrives in collaborative settings and believes that strong teamwork is key to delivering outstanding results.
Beyond just writing code, Stefan cares deeply about the business impact of his work, always aligning technical solutions with broader goals.
His drive to learn and grow makes him a valuable asset to any team seeking a developer who combines technical expertise with business awareness and a collaborative spirit.

work.description: Keytrade Bank is a Belgian online bank and brokerage firm.
work.summary: Part of a team responsible for the development of access management and onboarding at Keytrade Bank.
highlights: Developed the new onboarding process for Keytrade Bank inside the mobile application
Integrated itsme©️ for authentication and identification inside of the company
Migrated the old Access management system to a new one
Migrated all the Node.js codebases to Node.js 22
Part of the frontend chapter bringing new technologies to the company

work.description: Proximus is a Belgian telecommunications company.
work.summary: Part of a team responsible for the development of the Proximus TV application.
highlights: Developed new features on the Pickx application using React.js and Node.js
Developed and pushed the VOD catalog to production
Worked closely with the design team to create a user-friendly interface

work.description: Telenet is a Belgian provider of broadband internet, television, and telephone services.
work.summary: Part of a team responsible for the development of the Telenet field repair application.
highlights: Developed features on the field repair application using React.js and Node.js and PHP

work.description: VLAIO is the Flanders Innovation & Entrepreneurship agency.
highlights: Developed the new frontend for the KMO matchmaking platform

work.description: Hackages is a company that provides training and consulting services in modern web development.
highlights: Worked on the Hackages platform and also gave courses as part of the company's goal to teach business customers new technologies

work.description: Sopra Steria is a European leader in digital transformation.
highlights: Developed a proof of concept for the national police for fingerprinting suspects
Worked on facial analysis integration with robots for easier onboarding of new people in the office when they arrive
Worked in the digilab initiative which served as an incubator for new ideas and projects
